title: Review quarterly budget report
notes: Analyze Q4 financial performance and prepare recommendations for next quarter. Focus on comparing actual vs. budgeted expenses across all departments. Need to identify cost-saving opportunities and revenue optimization strategies for Q1 2025.

title: Buy groceries for dinner party
notes: Get ingredients for pasta, salad, and dessert for Saturday's dinner party. Menu includes: garlic bread, Caesar salad, chicken alfredo pasta, and tiramisu. Expecting 8 guests. Don't forget wine pairing suggestions from the sommelier.

title: Schedule annual health checkup
notes: Book appointments with primary care physician and dentist. Also schedule eye exam and dermatology screening. Review insurance coverage and update emergency contact information.

title: Plan weekend hiking trip
notes: Research trails, check weather, and pack gear for Sunday hike. Looking at moderate difficulty trails within 2-hour drive. Need to coordinate with hiking group and confirm transportation arrangements.

title: Update investment portfolio
notes: Review performance and rebalance asset allocation. Target allocation: 60% stocks, 30% bonds, 10% alternatives. Consider tax implications before making changes. Schedule meeting with financial advisor.
